mapper.insert: insert into employee_information (e_no, e_name, e_sex, e_birthhday, e_phone, e_password, firm_name, remarks) values (#{eNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eBirthhday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update employee_information set e_name = #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_sex = #{eSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_birthhday = #{eBirthhday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, e_phone = #{ePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_password = #{ePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firm_name = #{firmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where e_no = #{eNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select e_no, e_name, e_sex, e_birthhday, e_phone, e_password, firm_name, remarks from employee_information
